text.headline: Started as an Athlete
text.text: My early days as a competitive athlete (primarily soccer) sparked my interest in human health.

text.headline: B.S. in Exercise Physiology
text.text: Studied exercise physiology with a focus on musculoskeletal injury and rehab.

text.headline: Postbaccalaureate Research
text.text: Clinical Trial and Exploratory Biomarker/Drug Target Research.

text.headline: PhD in Bioinformatics
text.text: Developing statistical methods for biological data analysis (Emphasis Genomics).

text.headline: Data Scientist Role
text.text: Joined industry as a data scientist, applying advanced analytics to real-world problems.
